short.ar: Hit Em Up هي لعبة إطلاق نار ممتعة حيث نحاول إكمال المستويات.
short.am: ኤም አፕ ደረጃዎቹን ለማጠናቀቅ የምንሞክርበት አዝናኝ የተኩስ ጨዋታ ነው።
short.bg: Hit Em Up е забавна игра със стрелба, в която се опитваме да завършим нивата.
short.bn: হিট এম আপ একটি মজার শুটিং গেম যেখানে আমরা স্তরগুলি সম্পূর্ণ করার চেষ্টা করি।
short.ca: Hit Em Up és un divertit joc de trets on intentem completar els nivells.
short.cs: Hit Em Up je zábavná střílečka, kde se snažíme dokončit úrovně.
short.da: Hit Em Up er et sjovt skydespil, hvor vi forsøger at fuldføre banerne.
short.de: Hit Em Up ist ein lustiges Ballerspiel, bei dem wir versuchen, die Levels zu beenden.
short.el: Το Hit Em Up είναι ένα διασκεδαστικό παιχνίδι σκοποβολής όπου προσπαθούμε να ολοκληρώσουμε τα επίπεδα.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,no,pt_BR,: Hit Em Up is a fun shooting game where we try to complete the levels.
short.es: Hit Em Up es un divertido juego de disparos en el que trataremos de completar los niveles.
short.et: Hit Em Up on lõbus tulistamismäng, kus proovime tasemeid täita.
short.fa: Hit Em Up یک بازی تیراندازی سرگرم کننده است که در آن سعی می کنیم سطوح را کامل کنیم.
short.fi: Hit Em Up on hauska ammuntapeli, jossa yritämme suorittaa tasoja.
short.fil: Ang Hit Em Up ay isang nakakatuwang shooting game kung saan sinusubukan naming kumpletuhin ang mga level.
short.fr: Hit Em Up est un jeu de tir amusant où nous essayons de terminer les niveaux.
short.gu: હિટ એમ અપ એ એક મનોરંજક શૂટિંગ ગેમ છે જ્યાં અમે સ્તરો પૂર્ણ કરવાનો પ્રયાસ કરીએ છીએ.
short.he: Hit Em Up הוא משחק יריות מהנה שבו אנו מנסים להשלים את הרמות.
short.hi: हिट एम अप एक मजेदार शूटिंग गेम है जहां हम स्तरों को पूरा करने की कोशिश करते हैं।
short.hr: Hit Em Up je zabavna pucačka igra u kojoj pokušavamo završiti razine.
short.hu: A Hit Em Up egy szórakoztató lövöldözős játék, ahol megpróbáljuk teljesíteni a pályákat.
short.id: Hit Em Up adalah gim tembak-menembak yang menyenangkan di mana kami mencoba menyelesaikan levelnya.
short.it: Hit Em Up è un divertente gioco sparatutto in cui proviamo a completare i livelli.
short.ja: Hit Em Up は楽しいシューティング ゲームで、レベルをクリアしていきます。
short.kn: ಹಿಟ್ ಎಮ್ ಅಪ್ ಒಂದು ಮೋಜಿನ ಶೂಟಿಂಗ್ ಆಟವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ನಾವು ಹಂತಗಳನ್ನು ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಳಿಸಲು ಪ್ರಯತ್ನಿಸುತ್ತೇವೆ.
short.ko: Hit Em Up은 레벨을 완료하는 재미있는 슈팅 게임입니다.
short.lv: Hit Em Up ir jautra šaušanas spēle, kurā mēs cenšamies pabeigt līmeņus.
short.ml: ഞങ്ങൾ ലെവലുകൾ പൂർത്തിയാക്കാൻ ശ്രമിക്കുന്ന രസകരമായ ഒരു ഷൂട്ടിംഗ് ഗെയിമാണ് ഹിറ്റ് എം അപ്പ്.
short.mr: हिट एम अप हा एक मजेदार शूटिंग गेम आहे जिथे आम्ही स्तर पूर्ण करण्याचा प्रयत्न करतो.
short.ms: Hit Em Up ialah permainan menembak yang menyeronokkan di mana kami cuba melengkapkan tahap.
short.nl: Hit Em Up is een leuk schietspel waarin we proberen de levels te voltooien.
short.pl: Hit Em Up to zabawna strzelanka, w której staramy się ukończyć poziomy.
short.ro: Hit Em Up este un joc cu împușcături distractiv în care încercăm să completăm nivelurile.
short.ru: Hit Em Up — это веселая игра-стрелялка, в которой мы пытаемся пройти уровни.

short.sl: Hit Em Up je zabavna strelska igra, kjer poskušamo dokončati stopnje.
short.sw: Hit Em Up ni mchezo wa kufurahisha wa risasi ambapo tunajaribu kukamilisha viwango.
short.ta: ஹிட் எம் அப் என்பது ஒரு வேடிக்கையான படப்பிடிப்பு விளையாட்டு ஆகும், அங்கு நாங்கள் நிலைகளை முடிக்க முயற்சிக்கிறோம்.
short.te: హిట్ ఎమ్ అప్ అనేది సరదా షూటింగ్ గేమ్, ఇక్కడ మేము స్థాయిలను పూర్తి చేయడానికి ప్రయత్నిస్తాము.
short.th: Hit Em Up เป็นเกมยิงสนุก ๆ ที่เราพยายามผ่านด่านต่าง ๆ
short.tr: Hit Em Up, bölümleri tamamlamaya çalıştığımız eğlenceli bir atış oyunudur.
short.uk: Hit Em Up — весела гра-стрілялка, у якій ми намагаємося проходити рівні.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hit Em Up is a fun shooting game where we try to complete the levels by destroying the zombies that appear with an armed character.
Are you ready for a pulse-pounding adventure? Look no further than "Hit Em Up," the exciting HTML5 game that will test your skills. Keep you entertained for hours. In this game, you play as the hero, fighting off waves of enemy attackers and protecting the kingdom from destruction. With intuitive controls and smooth gameplay, "Hit Em Up" is easy to pick up but challenging to master. Use your quick reflexes and powerful weapons to defeat the enemy hordes. Watch as your hero becomes more robust and more potent with each passing level. And with vibrant graphics and a captivating storyline, "Hit Em Up" is a must-play game for fans of action and adventure.
But the fun doesn't stop there. "Hit Em Up" also features a variety of unlockable achievements and rewards, giving you even more reasons to keep playing and improving your skills. And with regular updates and new content added, you can be sure that "Hit Em Up" will always offer a fresh and exciting experience.
So why wait? Play "Hit Em Up" now and notice if you have what it carries to become the ultimate hero. With its challenging gameplay and engaging storyline, "Hit Em Up" will become your new favorite game. Try it now and join the adventure!
